nodes.text: The Raxus system was an Outer Rim star system in a sector known as the Tion Hegemony. It contained the planet Raxus Secundus, which served as the capital of the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars.

The Raxus system was a star system located in the Tion Hegemony of the Outer Rim Territories, at grid square S-5 on the Standard Galactic Grid. Home to the planets Raxus Secundus and Raxus Prime, the Raxus system had a single star, and played host to several different species, such as Gossam, humans, Ithorians, Leyakians, Siniteen, Twi'leks, and Weequay.

In 24 BBY, fallen Jedi Count Dooku gave a speech in the Raxus system, where he commandeered a HoloNet relay station within the system. In the speech, Dooku denounced the Galactic Republic as a futile enterprise that was burdened by corruption and favoritism toward the Core Worlds. Afterwards, the Serennian founded the Confederacy of Independent Systems and began a secessionist movement which resulted in thousands of star systems, including the Raxus system, leaving the Republic for the Confederacy.
